identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Zen Accountant' interface that calms financial anxiety through clarity, nature-inspired tones, and Swiss-style precision.

theme_strategy.name: Zen Accountant
theme_strategy.justification: Financial data is stressful. The UI should act as a calming agent. We use a 'Stone & Leaf' palette to reduce eye strain and evoke stability.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, card headers, and major metrics. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all data tables, labels, and inputs. Excellent legibility for numbers.

usage_rules: NEVER use pure black (#000000). Use Deep Evergreen (hsl(145 50% 10%)) for text.
Background is NOT white. It is 'Stone' (hsl(60 5% 96%)). Cards are White.
Use 'Lime' (Accent) sparingly for positive trends or active states.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md shadow-sm font-medium tracking-wide

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines if possible. Use custom tooltip.

tables.style: Clean rows. No vertical borders. Header text uppercase and small (text-xs tracking-wider text-muted-foreground).

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on the main background if possible (opacity 0.02).
visual_enhancers.empty_states: Use abstract geometric images for empty states.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'Crystal Glass' for the sticky top navigation: bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-border/50.

abstract_shapes.description: Minimalist abstract curves, use for 'Budget Goals' card background or empty state.
Soft geometric paper art, use for 'Savings' section background.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL RECHARTS: Run 'yarn add recharts' immediately. It is required for charts.
2. UPDATE INDEX.CSS: Replace the :root variables with the 'Stone & Evergreen' palette provided above.
3. UPDATE INDEX.HTML: Add the Google Fonts import link to the <head>.
4. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a 'DashboardLayout' component that implements the 'Control Room' grid.
5. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every button, input, and card has a unique data-testid (e.g., 'add-transaction-btn').
6. NO AUTH: Do not build login screens. Start directly at the Dashboard.
7. CURRENCY: Hardcode 'CAD' and '$' symbol for all monetary values.
8. TRANSPARENCY: Do not use 'bg-transparent' on the Navbar. Use the glassmorphism recipe provided.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid 'Stone' colors.
Do not center text in cards unless it is a single big number.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
